rows.title: A referral related to violence

introduction.eng:
Women’s Centre for Change (WCC) Counseling hotline: 011-3108 4001

Women's Aid Organisation (provides support for domestic violence victims). Hotline: 03 3000 8858

All Women's Action Society (services for gender-based violence, rape, domestic violence and sexual harassment). Telenita helpline: 0162374221/016-2284221

Childline Malaysia (services for child abuse, domestic violence, childline). Kasih Helpline: 15999
